title: Velderan
text:
Velderan is one of the three clans of the [[dragonmarked house]] [[Tharashk]]. This clan has the highest concentration of [[human]]s among the three clans, and many "[[half-orc]]" Velderans who have enough [[orc]] ancestry to manifest a [[Mark of Finding]] can easily pass as human. Among the families of the [[Shadow Marches]], the Velderan clan is known for its altruismâ€”a statement that would sound absurd to anyone familiar with Lord [[Khalar Velderan]] of [[Q'barra]].
